name: Frog Clicker
description:
Story

According to science people there are over 5,000 species of frogs in this world.
We thought we knew everything about frogs. We didn't.A 35 year long "war of frog" raged on. Nations argued over who knew the most about frogs, claiming to have found every secret.

The war is long over. They took the place you called home, they took your rights, they took everything from you because they didn't believe about the art of clicking frogs.

That is, until one day, this day, which is today.

Like every day you start off your morning walk through the sacred froggy woods in hopes of finding one of the last wild frogs. You hear a ribbit from a distance. Could this be it? You run towards the noise and sitting atop a rock in a pond of wonders you see it sitting there.

A frog.

This is when you finally make a stand against all that were against you. This is where you make a breakthrough in the world, and change it for the better.

Today is the day you click frog.

Gameplay

Anyways, Frog Clicker a.k.a the F.O.A.T(Frog of all time) is a clicker game with modern graphics, genre defining gameplay, and an engaging story that has more lore than people think Five Nights at Freddy's has

"We aren't in a pizzeria now." - Freddy

·Enjoy THOUSANDS of hours of gameplay*
·Click frogs day, or night!
·Click frogs ANYWHERE**
·Dynamic weather system
·Move up in the ranks for ULTIMATE internet bragging rights
·You know you want to click frog

Reviews from the gamedev community

"Who doesn't love frog clicker?" - KotieDev
"Frog Clicker changed my life. Without it, I wouldn’t be where I am today. If you’re not playing frog clicker then… where are you and what’re you doing?" - Cozy Toes
"Frog Clicker single handedly changed the industry with its innovative design" - Mujj
"Frog clicker takes priority over my friends and family" - n8dev
"This, now this is the reason I entered game dev, truly a masterpiece" - GamesBySaul
"It’s so good even ea coudn’t ruin it" - BlankDev

"Me, my son and my wife have finally got our lives back. I feel extremely blessed to have such a game in my library. My son (11) recently stopped playing Fortnite and my wife (52) has just recovered from labour with our lovely daughter. We've all been stressed out from these changes in our lives and Frog Clicker has literally fixed all of our problems. My wife has no longer got any fatigue, my son doesn't miss Fortnite and I no longer need to wear 2 pairs of pants to handle my bowel problems. Huge thanks to the dev, he's the best and I hope he knows how much he means to both me and the community. Play this game, fix all your problems." - That One Dad Review on every Steam game - also known as Matt Bull
"I toadally froget about the time toaday while playing this frogmatic clicker game" - Samyam
"Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson was really a spectacular casting choice whose acting really elevated this experience" - Butwhylevin
"Innovation ends today. For where else is there to go beyond Frog Clicker?" - LazyAlarm
"Frog Clicker is the reason I get up in the morning and the reason I dread sleep. I quit my job to play Frog Clicker professionally, and it's provided me the career of a lifetime. 10/10." - CobbDev
"I just can't stop clicking the frog! ★★★★★" - Manadono
"Following the brilliance of Easy Game, Frog Clicker demonstrates the creative genius of Fairlii (and his friend PolyMars). Not only does the game obliterate every video game release before it, but it is possibly the greatest accomplishment in human history. 4/10" - Polymars

*If you really want to play that long, it's up to you
**Anywhere as long as you have your PC with you
